import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { IpcService } from '../ipc.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-forgotpassword', templateUrl: './forgotpassword.component.html', styleUrls: ['./forgotpassword.component.css'] }) export class ForgotpasswordComponent { UserOtp:any formData:any = {}; Otp:any emailid:any constructor(private ipcserv:IpcService,private route:Router){ } onSubmit(){ this.UserOtp=this.formData.Otp this.SendAndGetOtp(this.UserOtp) } SendAndGetOtp(val:any){ return this.ipcserv.SendNGetOtp(val).subscribe((Otp:any) => { this.ipcserv.setOtp(Otp) this.route.navigateByUrl("/Otp") }); } } Sign In
